mods.abstract: $10 REWARD. ABSCONDED on the 17th inst. A black woman named DOLLEY, aged about 49 years, 5 feet, 2 or 3 inches high, or thereabouts; has the most of her teeth out in front; wore when she went an old stri ped gingham dress---Dolley formally belonged to the late Wm. Waller Wright deceased. She is well known by many person residing in the city and faubourg St Mary's, particularly in the neighborhood of Delord street and Magazine street. The above reward, and all reasonable expenses will be paid, on delivery to the subscriber, or lodged in jail, so that he can get her. H B STRINGER. m20tf
mods.note: Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )
mods.accessCondition: E-mail lsudiglib@lsu.edu with questions or comments about the collection.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
